Developed By
Mehedee Alam
Dept.of Computer Science & Engineering
Comilla University

Tour Guide For Comilla is speciallly developed for tourist who would like to visit our beautiful city.The guide includes necessary information about all the places a tourist would like to visit during his/her trip. User can find the location of a place using google map through the app. The app also provides the automatic dialling, location searching, visiting websites features.\n
